channel.title: I need help makingit so that every1 can get on my server
channel.description: title says all...im on my server and i started it and put localhost as the server thing and i tried 2 get my friend to get on and it wouldnt let him...help plz?...oh i almost forgot....server ip is MXscape.no-ip.org

item.title: I need help makingit so that every1 can get on my server
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

[quote=“private server pl0x, post:2, topic:13479”]i thik you need to portforward your server, look on the tutorial on the man page it shows you how there…

please can YOU tell me how to get a local host…?[/quote]
God cant you read?
« Last Edit: September 08, 2006, 08:42:46 pm by ryan123 »
